attributes.action: Scrap Job References in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to act on our wishes because it is hindering the vulnerable people in society, affecting the economy and being used by some employers/organisations against their employees.  It is increasing stress and the negative impacts of the pandemic has made this clause a huge cause of unemployment.
attributes.background: We want the government to remove this requirement from the employment system.  This aspect of job application creates room for discrimination.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to request references are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
